channel.title: Xplock 667/716
channel.description:
i copied the tutorial made from arcik just before in the tutorial page.. and everything compiled correctly until it came to skills.java.. im getting an error that looks like this in compiler
Compiling src\com\rs\game\player\Skills.java:173: error: cannot find symbol if (player.xplocked == 1) { ^ symbol: variable xplocked location: variable player of type Player
im not sure what it is what do i have to change? if you guys have done this or know what is wrong please reply with answers :o

Did you forget to import anything…?[/quote]

import com.rs.game.player.Player;

at idk:p

just check the tut and redo it
